products.name: Halter Neck Cotton Maxi Dress
products.description: Step into effortless style with our Halter Neck Cotton Maxi Dress! This must-have piece is crafted from soft, breathable cotton that keeps you cool and comfy all day. The flattering halter neck design adds a chic, modern touch, while the side pockets bring a dash of practicality and fun. The smocked back ensures that the fit hugs you just right and the halter neck tie detail makes adjustments easy. Whether you're sipping iced coffee with friends or strolling through the park, this dress has you covered in style. With its flowy fit and relaxed vibe, it's your go-to for both comfort and fashion—perfect for those sun-filled days when you want to look as good as you feel!This dress is machine washable, and wrinkle resistant, making it the perfect vacay fit. The colour will not fade no matter how many times you wash it, so enjoy with ease.

products.name: Vark Ivory Embellished A-Line Cotton Ethnic Set
products.description: Vark introduces this ivory set crafted in soft cotton for graceful festive ease. The A-line kurta features delicate embellished bird motifs and a refined crew neck that brings understated elegance to the look. It pairs with matching palazzos designed with an elasticated waistband for a snug yet relaxed fit and a beautifully flared fall., comfortable feel that keeps you looking stylish all day long.

products.name: Kids Off-White Animal Design Cotton-Blend Sweatshirt
products.description: Playful and full of charm, this off-white sweatshirt by HOP Kids brings a fun twist to cozy dressing. Crafted from a cotton-rich fabric, it features a creative crossbody strap detail leading to a 3D cow-face pocket complete with embroidered features and a tiny bow. Finished with a crew neck and full sleeves, it’s perfect for keeping little ones warm in style.

products.name: black cotton blend coord set
products.description: Upgrade your wardrobe with this chic Black Cotton Blend Coord Set.

products.name: Kids Red Striped Cotton Polo Sweater
products.description: Bring a playful twist to their playground lineup with this red polo sweater from HOP Kids. Milled from pure cotton, it’s fashioned with bold stripes that strike the perfect balance of fun and smart. A crisp collar with a buttoned placket sharpens the look, while long sleeves make it a cosy go-to for cooler days.

products.name: Kids Brown Colour-Blocked Cotton Polo Sweater
products.description: The chic colour-blocked design adds a fun, modern touch, and the classic polo collar brings a smart, polished look. Perfect for outings, school days, family gatherings, or casual winter wear.

products.name: purple cotton crop top

products.name: women solid long sleeves straight top
products.description: Get ready to level up your style with our Corset Panelled Midi Dress! With bold corset detailing that flatters your shape and a sleek, modern fit, this dress is all about confidence and effortless chic. The midi length keeps it classy, while the side pockets add that perfect touch of practicality. Whether you're dressing it up with heels or keeping it casual with sneakers, this dress is a must-have for any occasion. Sleek functional, and well fitted with convenient pockets—because who says you can’t look amazing and carry your phone at the same time? Its quick drying fabric helps avoid sweat patches plus it is made of crease-free fabric thus making it travel friendly..

products.name: shirt collar printed bottom set
products.description: A stylish Shirt Collar Printed Bottom Set featuring a smart collared top paired with trendy printed bottoms for a chic everyday look.

products.name: Kids Off-White Text Pattern Cotton Sweatshirt
products.description: A cozy twist on casual cool, this off-white sweatshirt from HOP Kids stands out with stylised text embroidery on a cotton-rich fabric. Designed with a contrast spread collar and full sleeves, it’s the perfect blend of comfort and style for relaxed winter days..

products.name: Baby Off-White Faux-Fur Jacket
products.description: Soft, warm and irresistibly cute, this off-white jacket from HOP Baby is crafted in plush faux-fur for gentle comfort. Designed with a hood, zipper placket and kangaroo pockets, it is finished with a sweet teddy motif at the back, making it a delightful layer to keep little ones snug on chilly days.

products.name: women solid long sleeve fur detailed jacket
products.description: A chic Women’s Solid Long Sleeve Fur Detailed Jacket designed for warm, stylish, and elegant winter layering.

products.name: Y&F Kids Black and White Fleece Jacket
products.description: A cozy Y&F Kids Black and White Fleece Jacket designed for warmth, comfort, and everyday winter style.

products.name: Flared High Jeans
products.description: Step into retro-inspired style with our Flared High-Waist Jeans. Designed to sculpt your waist and elongate your legs, these jeans feature a soft stretch-denim fabric for all-day comfort. The high-rise fit enhances your natural shape, while the dramatic flare adds movement and a bold, fashionable look. Perfect to pair with fitted tops, crop tees, or heels for an effortlessly stylish outfit.

products.name: Floral Full Length Cotton Woven Womens Skirt Kurta Dupatta Set
products.description: A beautiful Floral Full Length Cotton Woven Women’s Skirt Kurta Dupatta Set crafted for elegant, breathable, and festive-ready style.

products.name: Black Denim A-Line Dress
products.description: A chic Black Denim A-Line Dress designed for effortless style, comfort, and a flattering silhouette.

products.name: Front Pleated Cotton Midi Dress
products.description: This easy breezy dress comes with pleats along the frontline which gives this dress an A-Line look, making it super comfortable to carry. It is a must have for your vacations, lunch, or a day out running errands. The comfortable silhouette is flattering yet convenient. Made from smooth, wrinkle resistant fabric. Its quick drying fabric helps avoid sweat patches. The premium cotton fabric used to craft this dress ensures easy breathability and comfort.

products.name: Ruched Tie-up Sleeves Cotton Shirt
products.description: Add some flair to your basics with this Ruched Tie-Up Sleeves Cotton Shirt. Crafted from soft, breathable cotton, this shirt combines ultimate comfort with stylish details. The ruched, tie-up sleeves give it a trendy, relaxed vibe, while the two upper pockets add an extra touch of practicality and style. Whether you’re pairing it with your favorite jeans or leggings, this shirt is perfect for casual days when you want to look effortlessly chic. Simple, stylish, and totally on-trend—your new go-to piece for laid-back, cool vibes!The premium fabric is wrinkle-free and colour bleeding resistant and machine washable thereby making it long lasting and easy to maintain. No colour will come out in the wash, and every wash will only make the shirt better! The colours won't fade, and the shirt will keep it's shape!

products.name: Baby Light Blue Rainbow Design Sweater
products.description: Brighten up chilly days with this light blue sweater from HOP Baby, featuring a cheerful rainbow design on the front. Made for warmth and comfort, it’s styled with a round neck, full sleeves, and a soft fleece lining that keeps your little one snug through every cosy moment.flattering fit, while the relaxed leg provides easy movement and a laid-back vibe.

products.name: Wardrobe Off-White Solid Jacket
products.description: Elevate your everyday style with this chic Off-White Solid Jacket from Wardrobe. Designed for modern, confident women, this jacket blends elegance with versatility, making it perfect for both workwear and casual outings.

products.name: Baby Beige Crochet-Detailed Cotton Shirt with Shorts Set
products.description: Dress your little one in adorable comfort with this Baby Beige Crochet-Detailed Cotton Shirt and Shorts Set. Made from soft, breathable cotton, this outfit ensures all-day ease for active toddlers while keeping them looking stylish.

products.name: lavender faux fur jacket
products.description: Wrap yourself in pure comfort and charm with this stunning Lavender Faux Fur Jacket. Designed to make a statement, this jacket features a plush, ultra-soft faux fur texture that feels luxurious and looks effortlessly stylish. The soothing lavender shade adds a dreamy, feminine touch, perfect for elevating any winter outfit.

products.name: Baby Pink Butterfly Design Cotton Sweatshirt and Skirt Set
products.description: Dress your little one in adorable charm with this Baby Pink Butterfly Design Cotton Sweatshirt and Skirt Set. Made from soft, breathable cotton, this outfit keeps your child comfortable while adding a touch of playful elegance.

products.name: Kids Off-White Animal Printed Cotton-Blend Hoodie
products.description: This brown jacket by HOP Kids offers a refined yet practical style. Fashioned with a luxurious suede finish, it features a stand collar that extends to a zipper placket and multiple zippered pockets on the front. Complete with ribbed cuffs and hem, it ensures a sleek design and comfortable fit for any adventure.

products.name: Printed Shirt with Front Twist Skirt Co-ord
products.description: HOP Kids brings charm to winter dressing with this brown ombre sweater. Detailed with adorable animal motifs, it’s crafted from sumptuous fabric for a warm, cozy feel. Designed with a crew neck and full sleeves, it makes a playful yet comfortable addition to their cold-weather wardrobe.

products.name: Yellow Floral Printed Ethnic Pants
products.description: These yellow ethnic pants from Diza are adorned with floral motifs for a stylish statement. Made from a breathable fabric, they’re designed for all-day comfort and ease. An elasticated waistband with adjustable drawstrings ensures a flexible fit, while side pockets offer a functional touch.

The set features linen pants and a linen shirt which is longer in the back, and shorter in the front. The pants have a smooth waistband in the front, and a soft  elasticated back for the perfect fit. We have used the best quality linen fabric for this set, and have developed special technology to make sure that the linen wrinkles less so you can easily go through the day looking as polished as you did in the morning!
